Articles.Content:
I'm still new playing KSP and I'm having difficulties with my screen resolution. I have a 4K screen and whenever I'm playing KSP, I barely can read the words in there. My screen makes the letters turn smaller. I tried to lower the resolution and it helps but the graphics is no good. Do you guys have any other method to solve this problem? Let me know.

Thanks in advance.
Theres a bug report on it: http://bugs.kerbalspaceprogram.com/issues/8371 but not much in the way of solutions.

This has been reported countless times before dating back years and still hasn't been resolved even with the brand new 1.1 update. There's a UI scale but you can't increase the font size so anyone playing on a large monitor or expensive 4K set-up can't read anything. http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/80583-increase-font-size/
